info.description: This is a simple OJ-PoC API server.
info.title: OJ-PoC API

get.description: Export question score to CSV, XLSX, or JSON

parameters.description: Export format: csv, xlsx, or json
parameters.name: format

get.description: Get all user information

parameters.description: page number of results to return (1-based)
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: page size of results. Default is 10.
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get the user information

patch.description: Update the user information (partially or fully)

post.description: Change the email of a user
Reset the password of a user
Use basic authentication or token to login and get access token and refresh token
post.summary: User login with username and password

200.description: Return access token and refresh token

post.description: Logout user and invalidate refresh token

get.description: Handle OAuth callback and complete authentication

post.description: Use refresh token to get a new access token

get.description: Retrieve a list of all exams

post.description: Create a new exam with the provided details

get.description: Retrieve an exam's details using its ID

put.description: Update the details of an existing exam by ID

delete.description: Delete an exam using its ID

post.description: Associate a question with a specific exam
post.summary: Add a question to an exam

delete.description: Disassociate a question from a specific exam
delete.summary: Remove a question from an exam

get.description: Retrieve basic information about an exam, including title, description, start and end times
get.summary: Get basic information about an exam

get.description: Retrieve the leaderboard for a specific exam (Optional Authentication if Admin will show all users, otherwise only public users)
get.summary: Get the leaderboard for an exam

parameters.description: Page number of results to return (1-based)
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Page size of results. Default is 10.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.name: page

parameters.description: page size of results. Default is 10.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: page number of results to return (1-based)
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: page size of results. Default is 10.
parameters.name: limit

external_tracker_format.description: External Issue Tracker URL Format. Use the placeholders {user}, {repo} and {index} for the username, repository name and issue index.

external_tracker_style.description: External Issue Tracker Number Format, either `numeric` or `alphanumeric`

allow_only_contributors_to_track_time.description: Let only contributors track time (Built-in issue tracker)

enable_issue_dependencies.description: Enable dependencies for issues and pull requests (Built-in issue tracker)

created.description: Date and Time of user creation

last_login.description: Date and Time of last login

login_name.description: The login_name of non local users (e.g. LDAP / OAuth / SMTP)

source_id.description: The ID of the Authentication Source for non local users.
